title: Evaluate when to use relative vs absolute cell references in spreadsheet design
learning_objectives: Evaluate when to use relative vs absolute cell references in spreadsheet design

vocabulary.definition: The process of planning and structuring a spreadsheet for clarity, efficiency, and maintainability
Ensuring formulas behave predictably and correctly when copied across cells
The deliberate choice of reference types based on the intended formula behavior
When one cell's value relies on another cell's value through a formula
The ability to extend formulas to additional rows/columns without modification
Proven methods and conventions that lead to reliable, maintainable spreadsheets
